_header: Mislike it not to thee though I be of little body
_description: English translation of Latin elegiacs preceding a Speculum Medicorum — eleven lines

BLAdd34111.First Lines:
Mis like it nought to þe þo I be of litel bodiffor
                    þis litel short begynnyng bereþ profitable
                    þinges…
BLAdd34111.Last Lines:
…Þe leche of heuene whose hond ȝiffiþ all
                    þingSheweþ wonders in herbes þo it benoȝt so to
                    þe
